awards.title: Alistair Harvey Foundation Scholarship
awards.summary: This scholarship provides full financial sponsorship for outstanding students to pursue bachelor’s or master’s degrees at universities in the United Kingdom. Awarded in recognition of academic excellence, it covers tuition fees, term-time accommodation, round-trip airfares, and living expenses for up to two academic years. The comprehensive support aims to alleviate financial barriers, enabling awardees to focus on their studies and academic achievements in the UK.
